body_html: @shirishr there must be a difference between the CuDNN package that we build Caffe2 against and the installation on your machine. It seems like using the same version should fix it buy maybe there's another problem. Can you try installing from source? Use the scripts/build_anaconda.sh script as described here https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=mac&configuration=compile#anaconda-install-path

body: @shirishr there must be a difference between the CuDNN package that we build Caffe2 against and the installation on your machine. It seems like using the same version should fix it buy maybe there's another problem. Can you try installing from source? Use the scripts/build_anaconda.sh script as described here https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=mac&configuration=compile#anaconda-install-path
